abstract.text: Develop system extensions that enhance user security.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: Endpoint Security is a C API for monitoring system events for potentially malicious activity. You can write your client in any language that supports native calls. Your client registers with Endpoint Security to authorize pending events, or receive notifications of events that already occurred. These events include process executions, mounting file systems, forking processes, and raising signals.
Develop your system extension with Endpoint Security and package it in an app that uses the
framework to install and upgrade the extension on the userâ€™s Mac.
